LanguageData.VQEA_Herculean.label: herculean
LanguageData.VQEA_Herculean.description: Carriers of this gene possess immense superhuman strength, enabling them to strike with devastating force and carry vast loads with ease. Their blows can shatter bones, and they are never staggered by impact.
LanguageData.VQEA_Prowess.label: prowess
LanguageData.VQEA_Prowess.description: Carriers of this gene are masterful close-quarters combatants. Their accuracy and reflexes make them nearly impossible to hit in melee, while their strikes land with flawless precision.
LanguageData.VQEA_BlurRunner.label: blur runner
LanguageData.VQEA_BlurRunner.description: Carriers of this gene move at blinding speed, making them difficult to target with ranged attacks. Their enhanced reflexes and kinetic control allow them to traverse the battlefield in a blur.
LanguageData.VQEA_Woundless.label: woundless
LanguageData.VQEA_Woundless.description: Carriers of this gene rapidly heal from bleeding wounds. Their flesh seals itself moments after injury, preventing blood loss entirely and allowing them to fight through trauma that would kill others.
LanguageData.VQEA_Marksman.label: marksman
LanguageData.VQEA_Marksman.description: Carriers of this gene exhibit superhuman ranged precision. Their shots are faster, more accurate, and more lethal, giving them a distinct advantage in any firefight.
LanguageData.VQEA_PerfectVision.label: perfect vision
LanguageData.VQEA_PerfectVision.description: Carriers of this gene see with supernatural clarity at all distances and in total darkness. They are unaffected by low light or long range, and their perception dramatically improves ranged combat effectiveness.
LanguageData.VQEA_PlasteelSkin.label: plasteel skin
LanguageData.VQEA_PlasteelSkin.description: Carriers of this gene possess dense, reinforced dermal armor. Their skin resists bullets, absorbs blunt force, and disperses heat, turning their entire body into a living shield.
LanguageData.VQEA_PlasteelClaws.label: plasteel claws
LanguageData.VQEA_PlasteelClaws.description: Carriers of this gene grow synthetic alloy claws capable of slicing through armor and flesh. These natural weapons are always equipped and strike with brutal efficiency.
LanguageData.VQEA_Genius.label: genius
LanguageData.VQEA_Genius.description: Carriers of this gene learn at phenomenal speed and retain all knowledge. They do not suffer skill decay and can interface with technology at unmatched speeds, completing hacking tasks instantly.
LanguageData.VQEA_Levitation.label: levitation
LanguageData.VQEA_Levitation.description: Carriers of this gene can lift themselves using a controlled psychic field. They float over obstacles and terrain unharmed, immune to damage during transit and unaffected by difficult terrain.
LanguageData.VQEA_Serene.label: serene
LanguageData.VQEA_Serene.description: Carriers of this gene have archites embedded in their neural pathways that suppress fear, anger, and stress responses. As a result, they are utterly unshakable, incapable of mental breaks, social fights, or resisting arrest.
LanguageData.VQEA_PassiveMeditation.label: passive meditation
LanguageData.VQEA_PassiveMeditation.description: Carriers of this gene possess archites that passively channel ambient psychic energy, replenishing psyfocus without meditation. These ever-attuned minds remain sharp, composed, and ready to cast at all times.
LanguageData.VQEA_Bulwark.label: bulwark
LanguageData.VQEA_Bulwark.description: Archites within the carrier’s tissues reinforce cellular structures, reducing incoming damage by half. Pain receptors are dampened in favor of combat awareness, and the body itself resists trauma that would cripple an ordinary human.
LanguageData.VQEA_Enormous.label: enormous
LanguageData.VQEA_Enormous.description: Carriers of this gene are saturated with growth-regulating archites that massively increase body size and muscle mass. Their immense frame allows for feats of brute strength, at the cost of speed and appetite.
LanguageData.VQEA_SubstanceImpervious.label: substance impervious
LanguageData.VQEA_SubstanceImpervious.description: Specialized detoxifying archites patrol the bloodstream of carriers, instantly neutralizing addictive compounds and preventing overdose. No drug, however potent, can compromise their system.
LanguageData.VQEA_MasterfulAnimals.label: masterful animals
LanguageData.VQEA_MasterfulAnimals.description: The carrier's aptitude in Animals is increased by 16. Aptitude acts like an offset on skill level. Additionally, two levels of passion are added to Animals. Specialized archites embedded in the limbic system and motor cortex enable this enhanced empathy and coordination, creating a unique form of joy called animal relaxation while tending to animals.
LanguageData.VQEA_MasterfulArtistic.label: masterful artistic
LanguageData.VQEA_MasterfulArtistic.description: The carrier's aptitude in Artistic is increased by 16. Aptitude acts like an offset on skill level. Additionally, two levels of passion are added to Artistic. They work with intense passion, and when they create a masterpiece, a portion of the resources used is miraculously reclaimed. This is made possible by archites that optimize muscle memory and visual-spatial reasoning, recycling material with remarkable efficiency.
LanguageData.VQEA_MasterfulConstruction.label: masterful construction
LanguageData.VQEA_MasterfulConstruction.description: The carrier's aptitude in Construction is increased by 16. Aptitude acts like an offset on skill level. Additionally, two levels of passion are added to Construction. Occasionally, they exceed expectations, returning some of the materials used during construction as a result of their efficiency.
LanguageData.VQEA_MasterfulCooking.label: masterful cooking
LanguageData.VQEA_MasterfulCooking.description: The carrier's aptitude in Cooking is increased by 16. Aptitude acts like an offset on skill level. Additionally, two levels of passion are added to Cooking. Nanoscopic archites in the sensory cortex fine-tune taste and motor control, doubling the cooking speed.
LanguageData.VQEA_MasterfulCrafting.label: masterful crafting
LanguageData.VQEA_MasterfulCrafting.description: The carrier's aptitude in Crafting is increased by 16. Aptitude acts like an offset on skill level. Additionally, two levels of passion are added to Crafting. Archites guide the carrier’s fine motor skills and decision-making, ensuring peak performance in crafting.
LanguageData.VQEA_MasterfulMedical.label: masterful medical
LanguageData.VQEA_MasterfulMedical.description: The carrier's aptitude in Medical is increased by 16. Aptitude acts like an offset on skill level. Additionally, two levels of passion are added to Medical. Archites enhance decision-making and precision during operations, and preserve medicine during treatment (100% chance).
LanguageData.VQEA_MasterfulMelee.label: masterful melee
LanguageData.VQEA_MasterfulMelee.description: The carrier's aptitude in Melee is increased by 16. Aptitude acts like an offset on skill level. Additionally, two levels of passion are added to Melee. They instinctively strike for the heart or brain, dispatching enemies with terrifying efficiency. Archites synchronize muscle memory and visual targeting systems to prioritize lethal organs in combat.
LanguageData.VQEA_MasterfulMining.label: masterful mining
LanguageData.VQEA_MasterfulMining.description: The carrier's aptitude in Mining is increased by 16. Aptitude acts like an offset on skill level. Additionally, two levels of passion are added to Mining. Archites augment perception of mineral seams and tool control, granting increased yield and removing any usual mining yield caps.
LanguageData.VQEA_MasterfulPlants.label: masterful plants
LanguageData.VQEA_MasterfulPlants.description: The carrier's aptitude in Plants is increased by 16. Aptitude acts like an offset on skill level. Additionally, two levels of passion are added to Plants. Their expertise removes standard yield limits, allowing for extraordinary agricultural output.
LanguageData.VQEA_MasterfulIntellectual.label: masterful intellectual
LanguageData.VQEA_MasterfulIntellectual.description: The carrier's aptitude in Intellectual is increased by 16. Aptitude acts like an offset on skill level. Additionally, two levels of passion are added to Intellectual. They conduct research subconsciously, constantly generating scientific progress even while performing other tasks or resting. Archites woven into their neural network accelerate retention, synthesis, and intuition, allowing discoveries to emerge without active study.
LanguageData.VQEA_MasterfulShooting.label: masterful shooting
LanguageData.VQEA_MasterfulShooting.description: The carrier's aptitude in Shooting is increased by 16. Aptitude acts like an offset on skill level. Additionally, two levels of passion are added to Shooting. Every shot is precisely placed: if a head is present, it will be hit. Archites modify visual tracking and ballistic prediction, locking onto cranial targets with terrifying consistency.
LanguageData.VQEA_MasterfulSocial.label: masterful social
LanguageData.VQEA_MasterfulSocial.description: The carrier's aptitude in Social is increased by 16. Aptitude acts like an offset on skill level. Additionally, two levels of passion are added to Social. They can recruit even the most unwavering pawns and exert immense ideological influence.
LanguageData.VQEA_InfernoSpew.label: inferno spew
LanguageData.VQEA_InfernoSpew.description: Carriers of this gene can unleash a superheated stream of igniting bile, covering enemies and terrain in burning liquid. This ability turns any battlefield into a fiery trap.
LanguageData.VQEA_HellsphereBlast.label: hellsphere blast
LanguageData.VQEA_HellsphereBlast.description: Carriers of this gene can emit a devastating beam of energy from their eyes, vaporizing everything in its path. It mimics the firepower of a hellsphere cannon, condensed into a humanoid frame.
LanguageData.VQEA_Invisibility.label: invisibility
LanguageData.VQEA_Invisibility.description: Carriers of this gene can bend light and thermal signatures around their bodies using specialized archite nanites, causing them to vanish from sight. While the effect only lasts a short while, it can be used again almost immediately.
LanguageData.VQEA_SelfRepairingTissue.label: self-repairing tissue
LanguageData.VQEA_SelfRepairingTissue.description: Carriers of this gene possess archite-woven regenerative tissue that continuously rebuilds damaged cells and restores lost structure. They are capable of regrowing missing organs and body parts, but the process takes time.
LanguageData.VQEA_Electromagnetized.label: electromagnetized
LanguageData.VQEA_Electromagnetized.description: Carriers of this gene generate a stable internal electromagnetic field that makes them fully immune to EMP attacks. They can also release this charge in a powerful EMP burst, disabling electronics and mechanoids nearby.
LanguageData.VQEA_MatterPhasing.label: matter phasing
LanguageData.VQEA_MatterPhasing.description: Carriers of this gene can temporarily shift their bodies into a semi-intangible state, allowing them to pass through walls and solid obstacles. The effect lasts only briefly before their form solidifies again.
